mechanics.condition: Caster chooses a cube area (5ft to 100ft side) within range
mechanics.outcome: Area becomes magically secure for the spell's duration or until dismissed by caster's action
Any or all of the following properties can be applied to the warded area

mechanics.condition: Sound barrier property was chosen when casting
mechanics.outcome: Sound cannot pass through the barrier at the edge of the warded area

mechanics.condition: Vision barrier property was chosen when casting
mechanics.outcome: Barrier appears dark and foggy, preventing vision (including darkvision) through it

mechanics.trigger: Divination spell sensor attempted inside protected area
mechanics.condition: Divination sensor blocking property was chosen when casting
mechanics.outcome: Sensor cannot appear inside the protected area

mechanics.trigger: Divination spell sensor attempted to pass through barrier
mechanics.condition: Divination sensor blocking property was chosen when casting
mechanics.outcome: Sensor cannot pass through the barrier at its perimeter

mechanics.trigger: Divination spell targets a creature in the area
mechanics.condition: Divination targeting blocking property was chosen when casting AND creature is in the area
mechanics.outcome: Creatures in the area can't be targeted by divination spells

mechanics.trigger: Teleportation attempt into or out of warded area
mechanics.condition: Teleportation blocking property was chosen when casting
mechanics.outcome: Nothing can teleport into or out of the warded area

mechanics.trigger: Planar travel attempt within warded area
mechanics.condition: Planar travel blocking property was chosen when casting
mechanics.outcome: Planar travel is blocked within the warded area

mechanics.condition: Spell is cast on the same spot every day for a year

description_text: You make an area within range magically secure. The area is a cube that can be as small as 5 feet to as large as 100 feet on each side. The spell lasts for the duration or until you use an action to dismiss it. When you cast the spell, you decide what sort of security the spell provides, choosing any or all of the following properties: - Sound can't pass through the barrier at the edge of the warded area. - The barrier of the warded area appears dark and foggy, preventing vision (including darkvision) through it. - Sensors created by divination spells can't appear inside the protected area or pass through the barrier at its perimeter. - Creatures in the area can't be targeted by divination spells. - Nothing can teleport into or out of the warded area. - Planar travel is blocked within the warded area. Casting this spell on the same spot every day for a year makes this effect permanent.
